projects.title: E-Commerce Admin Dashboard
projects.description: E-Commerce Admin Dashboard is a web interface designed specifically for store administrators to manage and monitor their online business. It provides a centralized location to access key functionalities and gain insights into store performance.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A sleek, modern portfolio website designed to showcase personal projects, skills, and experience. Features include responsive design, interactive elements, and optimized performance.

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A user-friendly task management application built to help individuals and teams organize tasks and projects efficiently. Includes features such as task categorization, deadlines, and progress tracking.
